experiences.description: Front end development in B2C and B2B e-commerce applications for tourism industry.
The goal of the final project was to develop a fully-fledged travelling web app (mobile-first). I worked in a team with other four people in a SCRUM Agile framework.
I worked in a Wedding Photography Studio where I learned the ability to work in a team to achieve a shared goal.
